segments.text: You look like in perfect condition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go to the gym every day to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which sports do you participate in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been doing yoga for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me something about yoga ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yoga is used to promote people's physical , intellectual and mental harmony and healthy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you feel when you practice yoga ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I feel really tired and sweat a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it will help you keep fit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . But more importantly , I can have peace of mind .
segments.speaker: S2
